name: OnePlus 7
description: The OnePlus 7 has a 16 MP Front Camera with a flash. With this resolution, the smartphone is a good option for selfies. The OnePlus 7 features dual rear cameras, comprising 48 MP + 5 MP Dual Primary Cameras sensors, and supplemented by Dual LED Flash.
warrantyDetails: The manufacturer is providing 1 year of warranty

name: Google Pixel 3
description: The Google Pixel 3 mobile features a 5.5" (13.97 cm) display with a screen resolution of 1080 x 2160 pixels and runs on Android v9.0 (Pie) operating system. The device is powered by Octa core (2.5 GHz, Quad core, Kryo 385 + 1.6 GHz, Quad core, Kryo 385) processor paired with 4 GB of RAM.
warrantyDetails: The manufacturer is providing 1 year of warranty on the device and 6 months of warranty on accessories.

name: Huawei P20 Pro
description: The Huawei P20 Pro mobile features a 6.1" (15.49 cm) display with a screen resolution of 1080 x 2240 pixels and runs on Android v8.1 (Oreo) operating system. The device is powered by Octa core (2.36 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A73 + 1.8 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A53) processor paired with 6 GB of RAM.
warrantyDetails: The manufacturer is providing 1 year of warranty
